name: Active Defense
desc: You defend yourself, mitigating an incoming blow.
trigger: You are Attacked, take Damage, or gain Status.
effect:
Choose one:
* Gain 1 _Temporary_ _Stamina_ and 1 _Instant Guard_.
* _Parry_.

After resolving the triggering effect, gain _Reeling_ 1.
boost: [_Reeling_/2] _Momentum_ (rounded down): Gain both effects.

name: Aftershock
desc: You amplify the impact of a foe hitting the ground, creating a resonant quake.
trigger: A foe in _Uneven Earth_ is knocked _Prone_.
effect:
Choose one:
* Inflict _Vulnerable_ 1 in a _Burst_ 1 around the Target.
* Remove up to 3 _Vulnerable_ from the _Target_, dealing 2 Damage for each. This does not count against your normal _Vulnerable_ removal limit.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The Cost is instead None and Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance. Resolve both effects, then inflict _Reeling_ 1 [_Avoidable_, _Groundsource_] in a _Burst_ 1.

name: Aggressive Orders
desc: You urge a nearby all on, allowing them a strike.
effect: Choose an ally within Range. Grant them a _Free Turn_ where they may make a _Minor Attack_ and _Step_, but must Target a creature within Range 3 of you.
boost:
Choose one:
* 1 _Momentum_: You ally may instead _Reposition_.
* 2 _Momentum_: Instead, your ally may make a _Major Attack_ instead of a _Minor Attack_. 

This cost may be paid by you, the Target, or split between the two of you.

name: Aim
desc: You sacrifice mobility to take the chance to aim, preparing the perfect strike.
reqs: Have not used _Movement_ this _Turn_ and have _Movement_ this _Turn_.
effect: Gain a +1 _Bonus_ on your _Attack Roll_. Decrease your _Movement_ this _Turn_ by one tier.

name: Ambush
desc: You move forward rapidly out of the shroud of shadows, launching a vicious assault against an unsuspecting foe.
effect: Any creatures that see you as _Obscured_ at the start of your _Turn_ see you as _Obscured_ for the remainder of this _Turn_. Make a single _Light_/_Versatile_ _Minor Attack_. All Targets must see you as _Obscured_.
special: Do not remove _Stealthy_ until the end of this _Turn_ if it would normally be removed.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: You have _Advantage_ on an _Attack_ you make this _Turn_.  You may use this _Boost_ any number of times.

name: Arc Lightning
desc: You bend and curve your electricity as it crashes into a foe, splintering it across the battlefield.
effect: Choose another Target within Range 3 of a creature targeted by the Attack. When determining the _Lightning_ Damage treat that Target as a part of this Attack's _Area_.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_: Instead, choose another Target within Range 6.
* 1 _Momentum_. Repeat the Effect. You must target a new creature.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The Cost is instead None. You may freely use the _Boost_ twice, and, when choosing new Targets, you may choose ones targeted by the Attack or added as a target by this _Gambit_.

name: Basic Feint
desc: You feint one way before attacking another, providing yourself an advantage.
effect: The Target of the Attack must immediately expend 2 _Stamina_ (_Mental_). If they do not, gain _Advantage_ on this _Attack_.

name: Basic Flourish
desc: You disengage from an attack artfully, knocking a foe backwards and off-balance.
effect: Inflict _Reeling_ 1, _Vulnerable_ 1, _Push_ 1.

name: Basic Sunder
desc: You focus an attack on breaking a foe's armor or guard.
effect: Add [_Overwhelming_ 2].
boost: 1 _Momentum_: If the Damage dealt with this _Attack_ is greater than or equal to the _Durability_ of the creature's _Armor_ or a _Wielded_ _Shield_, inflict _Sundered_.

name: Bastion's Fury
desc: You unleash a mighty strike against a foe that dared to ignore you.
reqs: Target must be a creature that Attacked one of your allies this _Round_.
effect: Gain a +1 _Bonus_ on the Attack and, on a _Graze_+, add _Marked_.
special: If the Attack is _Area_, apply the effect only on Targets that attacked an ally.

name: Blastguard
desc: You use your mastery of the explosives and fire magic to defend yourself.
trigger: You take _Fire_ Damage or would take Damage or gain Status from an _Explosion_ ability.
effect: Gain 1 _Instant Guard_ and 1 _Temporary_ _Stamina_. Gain _Resistance_ 2 (_Fire_) this _Turn_ and reduce any _Dazed_ inflicted by 1.
special: If this was an _Area_ effect, apply the _Boost_ once at no Cost.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Gain an additional 1 _Instant Guard_ and _Temporary_ _Stamina_, and increase the _Resistance_ by 2. You may use this _Boost_ up to twice.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Cost is instead None. In addition to the normal effect, add [_Glancing_] to the triggering effect.

name: Bolting Rain
desc: Your attacks come from the sky, crashing down on foes with pinpoint accuracy.
effect: Create a _Hazard_ within _Range_ that counts as an _Electric_ space. If a creature enters that space deal 2 _Lightning_ Damage and inflict _Shocked_ 1, then remove the _Hazard_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Resolve the Effect again. You may not place _Hazards_ adjacent to one another. You may use this Boost any number of times.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The Cost is instead None, and Range is instead your spirit's Reposition distance. You may freely use the _Boost_ 3 times.

name: Building Fury
desc: You snarl through a foe's assault, preparing to unleash violent vengeance.
trigger: You are Attacked, take Damage or gain Status.
effect: Gain 1 _Temporary_ _Stamina_ and add _Enraged_ 1 to the triggering effect. After fully resolving the triggering effect, gain _Vigor_ 2.
special: If you make an Attack as a part of removing _Charging_ you may treat all creatures in the _Area_ as the target of your rage.

name: Burn Down
desc: You detonate the flames on a foe, scorching them in a sudden burst
effect: After fully resolving the Attack, resolve _Alight_'s end-of-_Phase_ effect on the Target, then reduce their _Alight_ by an additional 1.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Cost is instead None. In addition to the Effect, deal half the Damage the Target took from _Alight_ in a _Burst_ 1 centered on them.

name: Buzzing Flourish
desc: You use the cover of an attack to fly forward, avoiding retaliation.
reqs: You _Hit_+ with an Attack against an adjacent foe.
effect: Immediately _Step_. If it is _Phase_ 4 or earlier, add [_Safe_].

name: Catching Wind
desc: You seize an object in midair, sending it careening along a new path.
trigger: A _Ranged_ Attack goes through a _Gusting_ or _Twister_ space within Range.
effect:
Choose one:
* If the Attack is made by you or an ally and goes through a _Gusting_ space, add [_Winding_]. The _Winding_ path must follow the direction of _Gusting_ spaces; upon leaving a _Gusting_ space draw a new Attack Line using the remaining Range, the first space of which must match the direction of the _Gusting_ space.
* If the Attack is made by you or an ally and goes through a _Twister_ space, draw a new _Attack Line_ using the remaining Range in any direction.
boost: [_Reeling_/2] _Momentum_: If the Attack is made by a hostile creature, impose _Disadvantage_. Gain _Reeling_ 1.

name: Cleansing Wave
desc: You solidify the water that would encase a foe into a protective barrier.
trigger: You or an ally within Range 4 would gain _Soaked_.
effect: Your ally may resolve any effects of their choice that would trigger from gaining _Soaked_. After, they do not gain any _Soaked_, but instead 3 _Vigor_ + the _Soaked_ value, and regain 1 _Stamina_. While your ally has this _Vigor_, they have _Resistance_ 1 (_Fire_). Place _Wet_ spaces adjacent to your ally equal to the amount of _Soaked_ your ally would have gained.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The Cost is instead None and Range is instead your spirit's Reposition distance. Grant your _Spirit_ the same amount of _Vigor_.

name: Cunning Blow
desc: You exploit an opening in a foe's defenses to drive your attack deep.
reqs:
You make a Single-Target _Light_/_Versatile_ Attack against an _Exposed_ target and at least one of the following is true:
* Have _Advantage_ on the _Attack_.
* Have an ally who is adjacent to the Target.
effect: If you remove _Exposed_ for a _Bonus_, gain a +2 _Bonus_ instead of +1 and deal +2 _Damage_. After resolving the Attack, inflict your choice of _Hobbled_/_Reeling_ 1.

name: Chip Damage
desc: When foes strike your armor vicious bits of shrapnel punish their efforts.
trigger: You would take Damage while you have Stone Armor or used an _Earth_ _Defensive_ _Reaction_.
effect: Deal 2 Stab Damage [_Avoidable_] in a _Burst_ 1.
special: If the Guard of your Stone Armor is reduced by the triggering Attack, cost is instead None. If it destroyed your Stone Armor, deal +4 _Bonus Damage_.

name: Churning Wind
desc: You create a violent twist of wind, sending dust and detritus flying into the air.
effect: Create an _Veiled_ space within Range.
special: You may choose to target a _Windy_ space or _Obstacle_ with this _Manuever_. If you do, remove the _Windy_ space and instead resolve the Effect in that space and all adjacent ones.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The _Cost_ is now none and Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance. Always resolve the Effect as if you removed a _Windy_ space, and you may apply the Boost at no cost. You may choose to _Summon_ you spirit to a space in the _Area_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Inflict _Vulnerable_ 1 on any creatures in a space that is made _Veiled_. You may use this _Boost_ any number of times.

name: Coiled Guard
desc: You make yourself a miniscule target as you prepare for an assault.
effect: Until the end of the next _Phase_, gain _Stealthy_. Creatures in a _Hazard_ you created always treat you as _Lightly Obscured_, even to _Secondary Senses_.
special: You may use this _Action_ while _Charging_.

name: Compress Earth
desc: You seize a nearby piece of terrain, condensing it into a mighty boulder.
effect:
Choose one:
* Gain 1 _Momentum_ then turn a Size 1 _Earthen_ _Obstacle_ within Range into a _Boulder_.
* Make a _Boulder_ in an _Earthen_ space within Range.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Range is instead 4
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance, and Cost is instead None. Gain 1 _Momentum_.

name: Controlled Burn
desc: You quench flames or thaw allies, creating a respite from the fury of flames.
effect:
Choose one:
* Remove 3 _Blazing_ spaces.
* Remove _Alight_/_Frigid_ 2 from an ally within Range. This ally may immediately _Recover_. For this _Recover_ the ally may only spend _Stamina_ on _Alight_/_Frigid_, but treats all _Stamina_ spent as worth twice as much.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Resolve an additional Effect. You may choose the same effect multiple times.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Use the Boost twice freely and grant your Spirit 4 _Health_.

name: Corral
desc: You make your way forward, reorienting creatures as you go.
effect: Three times during this Move you may inflict _Push_/_Pull_ 1. You may _Pull_ at _Range_ 2 if you target a creature that you just left adjacency with.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Inflict _Push_/_Pull_ 1 another time. You may use this _Boost_ any number of times.

name: Crater
desc: You amplify the destructive power of your flames to destroy everything in its path.
effect: Add [_Siege_]. You may treat this Attack as dealing _Crush_ Damage when determining Damage against _Obstacles_. In addition, _Destroy_ all _Field_ and _Surface_ _Terrain_ in the centermost space this Attack targeted.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Destroy all _Field_ and _Surface_ _Terrain_ in an additional 2 spaces targeted by this Attack.  You may use this _Boost_ any number of times.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The cost is instead None. This Attack deals +2 Damage to _Obstacles_, and you freely use the Boost 2 times.

name: Deadeye
desc: You use the high ground to your advantage, unleashing an unavoidable strike.
reqs: You make a Single-Target _Ranged_ Attack against a foe at a lower _Elevation_.
effect: Gain a +1 _Bonus_ on this _Attack_ and add [_Arcing_]. You may treat your _Total Height_ as 1 higher when determining _Cover_.

name: Douse
desc: You drench an ally, providing them a watery shell.
effect: _Draw_ up to 2 within Range, then inflict a total value of _Soaked_ on yourself or allies within Range equal to the _Draw_. For example, if you _Draw_ 2, you could inflict _Soaked_ 1 on two targets or _Soaked_ 2 on one Target.
special: Any ally that receives _Soaked_ that has _Status_ that _Soaked_ removes may immediately _Recover_. For this _Recover_ the ally may only spend _Stamina_ on those _Statuses_, but treats all _Stamina_ spent as doubled. If the Status cannot normally be removed with _Stamina_, it can instead be removed for 1 _Stamina_ (which is not doubled).
boost: 1 _Momentum_: _Draw_ 2 more. You may use this _Boost_ any number of times.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Use the _Boost_ twice freely and grant your _Spirit_ 4 _Health_.

name: Duelist's Invitation
desc: With careful positioning and exceptional technique you prepare for single combat.
reqs: Triggering _Attack_ must have inflicted _Marked_ on a single target.
effect: While the creature is _Marked_ by you, gain 1 _Temporary_ _Momentum_ each _Turn_ that may only be spent against _Marked_ creatures. This effect ends if you use it another enemy, an ally damages or inflicts a condition on this creature, or you end your _Turn_ non-adjacent to the Target.

name: Expert Improviser
desc: You strike a foe, breaking your weapon in the most opportune way.
effect: On a _Hit_+, add _Blinded_ [2 _Stamina_] or _Vulnerable_ 1 on a _Graze_-.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: After resolving this attack, create an _Improvised_ in a space adjacent to the target. This weapon retains the Material of the original and has [_Fragile_, _Opportune_], but decreases in size by one. A _Large Improvised_ Weapon would become a _Medium Improvised_ Weapon, for example. You may only use this _Boost_ if the original _Weapon_ was at least a _Medium Improvised_ Weapon.

name: Darting Posture
desc: You adopt a mobile posture, creating a state of constant movement.
effect:
Becoming _Guarding_. While _Guarding_ in this way:
* You do not act as if _Hobbled_.
* Attacks against you take a -1 _Penalty_, or -2 if you Attacked that creature this _Round_.
* You may Move 1 [_Safe_] at the end of each _Phase_.

name: Delayed Blast
desc: You focus an explosion, leaving a horrifying mote of flame waiting to detonate.
trigger: You make a _Flame_ _Attack_.
effect: Create a _Hazard_ in the _Area_ the Attack would Target (1 space if no _Area_). At the end of any _Phase_ you may end the _Enchant_ and remove the _Hazard_. When the _Hazard_ is removed, use this Attack, resolving it in _Area_ immediately. Deal +1 _Bonus Damage_ on a _Graze_+ for every _Phase_ that the _Hazard_ was not removed. Determine _Speed Penalty_ based on when the Attack is resolved, not when this _Gambit_ was used.
special: Use this _Gambit_ when an Attack would be resolved. For example, if used with a _Charged Attack_, use this _Gambit_ when you would unleash the _Charged Attack_.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_] and remove [_Enchant_]. The cost is instead None. _Summon_ you spirit to a space in the _Hazard_. Instead of +1 _Bonus Damage_, add _Alight_ 1 on a _Graze_+ for every _Phase_ that the _Hazard_ was not removed. You may stop summoning your spirit at no cost immediately before removing the _Hazard_. If you _Spirit_ is _Defeated_, immediately remove the _Hazard_.

name: Disengage
desc: You focus your efforts on moving away from hostile foes.
effect: Add [_Safe_] to all _Movement_ this _Turn_.

name: Distracting Step
desc: You step through a foe, barely skirting their defenses and leaving them reeling.
effect: Inflict _Reeling_ 1 on any creature who's space you move through this _Turn_.

name: Dodge
desc: You slip away from an incoming attack, avoiding the brunt of the blow.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: _Step_ and use the _Tumble_ _Manuever_ at no cost. If you do not _Move_ at least one space, this _Maneuver_ instantly fails. If the Attack was Single-Target, add [_Glancing_]. If it was _Area_ and you are no longer in the _Area_, add [_Glancing_]. After resolving all other effects, gain _Reeling_ 2.
special: The Attacker treats this Attack as if it was a _Miss_ for the purpose of _On Miss_; it treats it as the actual roll for all other effects.

name: Draw/Stow
desc: You grab an unattended item or change your equipment.
cost: 1 _Momentum_, or 0 _Momentum_ if the Equipment has the _Quickdraw_ property.
effect:
Choose one:
* Create an _Opening_. _Equip_/_Wield_ (if you have the appropriate _Open Hands_) a single unattended, adjacent piece of _Equipment_, or place that piece of Equipment in a different adjacent space.
* _Equip_ a _Wielded_ piece of _Equipment_.
* _Wield_ (if you have the appropriate _Open Hands_) an _Equipped_ piece of _Equipment_.
special: Before _Wielding_ an item, you may choose to stop _Wielding_ _Equipment_ of your choice, placing them unattended in your current or adjacent spaces.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Do not create an _Opening_.

name: Dual Fangs
desc: You prepare a vicious strike with multiple avenues, leaving multiple options open.
effect: Instead of immediately resolving the attack, become _Charging_ and create two _Hazards_ within _Reach_. At the end of this _Phase_, resolve the Attack against any Targets in these _Hazards_. If there is a target in both spaces, add [_Glancing_]. If there is only a Target in one space, inflict _Exposed_ 1 before resolving the Attack.
special: Increase the _Reach_ of this Attack by 1.

name: Duelist's Defense
desc: You focus your defenses on a singular target, providing an impenetrable defense.
effect:
Become _Guarding_. While _Guarding_:
* All Attacks by the Target take a -1 _Penalty_ against you.
* Gain 1 _Guard_ against all Attacks made by the Target. 
* Treat your _Reeling_ as half its current value when using _Reactions_ against the Target.
* Treat your _Reeling_ as 2 higher for all other creatures.
special: If you have a creature adjacent to you other than the Target, you do not benefit from the Efect, but remain _Guarding_. Lose this _Guarding_ if you deal Damage to or inflict Status on a creature other than the Target.

name: Earthen Fortress
desc: You adjust the composition of the earth, either creating difficult terrain or smoothing it.
effect: Choose an _Earthen_ spaces within Range. You may add or remove _Fortified_ to this space.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: You may target an additional contiguous spaces. You may use this _Boost_ any number of times.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The Cost is instead None and Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance. Instead, resolve the effect in three contiguous _Earthen_ spaces. A single ally or enemy in one of these spaces either regains 1 _Stamina_ or gains _Dazed_ 1.

name: Earthen Implement
desc: You use your powers to swiftly wield an earthen item.
cost: 1 _Momentum_, or 0 _Momentum_ if the Equipment has the _Quickdraw_ property.
effect: Choose an un-_Equipped_ _Earthen_ piece of _Equipment_ within Range, or one that you have _Equipped_/_Wielded_. You may _Puppet_ it from its current space until the end of the _Turn_.
special: You may use _Draw/Stow_ once at no cost on the target piece of _Equipment_ this _Turn_ and never create an _Opening_ when doing so.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Add [_Enchant_, _Upkeep_ X], where X is 1 if the _Equipment_ is One-Handed or 2 otherwise. The _Equipment_ remains a _Puppet_ as long as the _Enchant_ persists.

name: Earth Shaper
desc: You quickly form the earth, creating a safe bastion or removing it just as swiftly.
effect: Choose 2 contiguous _Earthen_ spaces within Range. You may either make these spaces _Uneven Earth_, or remove _Uneven Earth_/_Jagged_ from them. You may choose which effect to resolve on each space independently.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: You may target an additional 2 contiguous spaces. You may use this _Boost_ any number of times.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The Cost is instead None and Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance. Instead, resolve the effect in a _Blast_ 1 _Area_, centered on an _Earthen_ space within Range and targeting all spaces in the _Area_. You may choose to _Summon_ your spirit to the centermost space of this _Area_.

name: Electrify
desc: You imbue the ground with electricity, preparing it to conduct a mighty current.
effect: Place 3 _Electrified_ spaces within Range. All _Electrified_ spaces placed by this Manuever must be contiguous.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Place an additional 2 _Electrified_ spaces. You may use this _Boost_ up to 3 times.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The Cost is instead None. Choose a space within your spirit's _Reposition_ distance and resolve all effects from that space, applying the _Boost_ twice.  You may choose to _Summon_ your spirit to any space that becomes _Electrified_.

name: Engage
desc: You obstruct a foe's movement, making it difficult for them to advance.
trigger: A creature of your Size or smaller moves adjacent to you with Movement without [_Rush_], [_Safe_] or [_Leaping_].
effect: The creature must pay 2 _Momentum_. If they do not, their Movement immediately ends and you may inflict _Marked_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, Trigger is 'A creature your Size + 1 or smaller'.

name: Critical Hit
desc: You exploit a vulnerability to the limit, inflicting grave damage on a foe.
effect: Deal +1 _Damage_ and you may remove an additional _Vulnerable_ on the Target.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, deal +3 _Damage_ and you may remove a total of an additional 2 _Vulnerable_ on the Target.

name: Explosive Flames
desc: You focus your flames more on immediate power than sustained burn, causing them to violently erupt.
trigger: You make a _Flame_ _Attack_.
effect: Do not inflict _Alight_ with this Attack. Deal +X _Fire_ Damage, where X is the value of _Alight_ you would inflict. If X is at least 1, add _Dazed_ 1.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: In addition, add _Forceful_ _Push_ X.

name: Firestarter
desc: You spread flames across the battlefield.
effect: Place 3 _Blazing_ spaces within Range. All _Blazing_ spaces placed by this Manuever must be contiguous.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Place an additional 2 _Blazing_ spaces. You may use this _Boost_ up to 3 times.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The Cost is instead None. Choose a space within your spirit's _Reposition_ distance and resolve all effects from that space, applying the _Boost_ twice.  You may choose to _Summon_ your spirit to any space that becomes _Blazing_.

name: Flank
desc: You launch a quick assault, diverting a foe's attention so an ally can strike.
trigger: An adjacent foe is Attacked.
effect: The targeted foe must pay 1 _Stamina_ or else the triggering Attack gains a +1 _Bonus_.

name: Flameguard
desc: You use your mastery of the flame and fire magic to defend yourself.
trigger: You take _Fire_ Damage, gain _Alight_, or would take Damage or gain Status from _Fire_ _Terrain_/_Obstacle_, a Fire _Weapon_, or a _Blaze_ ability.
effect: Gain 1 _Instant Guard_ and 1 _Temporary_ _Stamina_. Gain _Warded_ 1 (_Alight_) and _Resistance_ 1 (_Fire_) this _Turn_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Gain an additional 1 _Instant Guard_ and _Temporary_ _Stamina_, and increase the _Warded_ and _Resistance_ by 1. You may use this _Boost_ up to twice.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Cost is instead None. In addition to the normal effect, add [_Glancing_] to the triggering effect.

name: Flame Sculptor
desc: You sculpt the flames in an attack, bending them around allies and shielding them.
effect: Do not resolve the Attack in up to 2 spaces of the _Area_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Choose another space in the _Area_ to not resolve the Attack in. You may use this _Boost_ any number of times.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Cost is instead None. In addition to the normal effect, for every 2 spaces you exempt you may add an additional space to the _Area_. These additional spaces must be contiguous with the original _Area_. In addition, you may _Summon_ your spirit to a space in the _Area_ that you did not resolve the Attack in.

name: Flashing Charge
desc: Your lightning burns white-hot, searing the eyes of foes it collides with.
trigger: A _Phase_ begins.
effect: Become _Charging_ until the end of the _Phase_. While _Charging_ any foes that Attack you take 1 _Lightning_ Damage. After removing _Charging_ your next _Storm_ Attack inflicts _Blinded_ [2 _Stamina_] in a _Blast_ 1 centered on any Target of the Attack.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Cost is instead None. _Summon_ your spirit to an unoccupied space adjacent to a _Minor Source_ within their _Reposition_ distance. They immediately use the Effect and gain all benefits. Upon removing _Charging_ naturally, your Spirit may immediately use a _Storm_ _Minor Attack_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_ (when using the _Manifest_ option): Instead, your Spirit may make a _Storm_ _Major Attack_.

name: Flitter
desc: You began to swiftly move about, making yourself a hard target.
trigger: A _Phase_ begins.
effect: All Attacks against you this _Phase_ take a -1 _Penalty_. Once this _Phase_ you may take a _Free Turn_ to _Step_ [_Safe_].

name: Floating Escape
desc: You slip just out of a foe's reach as they strike, defending yourself.
trigger: You are Attacked, take Damage or gain Status.
effect: Either gain 1 _Temporary_ _Stamina_ and reduce the _Attack Roll_ by 1 or gain 2 _Temporary_ _Stamina_. You may _Step_ [_Safe_] as a part of this _Reaction_, but gain _Hobbled_ 1 if you do so. Gain _Reeling_ 1.
special: If the triggering Attack came about due to an _Opening_ add [_Glancing_].

name: Flying Snow
desc: You form ice into a ramp, launching yourself upward and forward.
effect: _Draw_ 1, then resolve the Move. This may interrupt a different Move and, if used as a part of a [_Rush_] Move, you may change the direction of the [_Rush_] after resolving this Move. Make one of the spaces you move through _Frosted_.
special: You may use this Stunt without a _Frozen_ space, but instead _Draw_ 3. Make 3 spaces you move through _Frosted_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: For this Move, your _Step_ is 3 instead of its typical value.

name: Fracture
desc: You connect with an earthen obstacle, shattering it.
effect: Pick an _Earthen_ _Obstacle_ within Range. Inflict 10 _Damage_. If this _Destroys_ the _Obstacle_, you may deal 2 _Stab_ _Damage_ [_Avoidable_] in a _Burst_ 1 around it. You are exempt from this Damage.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_: This is instead _Range_ 4.
* 1 _Momentum_: Increase the Damage dealt by 2.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The Cost is instead None and Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance. If the _Obstacle_ is _Destroyed_, grant your spirit 5 _Health_. You may choose to _Summon_ your spirit to a space the _Obstacle_ occupied.

name: Free Run
desc: You use an obstacle to accelerate yourself, moving further still.
trigger: You move adjacent to an Obstacle of Size 1 or greater.
effect: You may Move 1 [_Safe_, _Leaping_] then _Step_ [_Safe_, _Breach_].

name: Frostbend
desc: You manipulate ice and snow, freezing and unfreezing as you please.
effect:
Choose one:
* Choose two contiguous _Watersource_ spaces within Range. _Draw_ 1 from each of them, then make them _Frozen_.
* Make three contiguous _Frozen_ spaces _Wet_ or _Frost_.
* _Draw_ 1, then place a _Frozen_ space within _Range_.
special: Gain _Snowdraw_ this _Turn_. If you already have _Snowdraw_, you may use the _Boost_ once at no cost.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Choose an additional option from the Effect. You may choose the same option multiple times. You may use this _Boost_ any number of times.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The Cost is instead None. Choose a space within your spirit's _Reposition_ distance and resolve all effects from that space. Your spirit gains _Snowdraw_ and may _Draw_ 4 within Range, then place 4 contiguous _Frozen_ spaces that include the Target space. You may not _Boost_ when using this option. You may choose to _Summon_ your spirit to any space in this Area.

name: Frostguard
desc: You use your mastery of the ice and aquatic magic to defend yourself.
trigger: You take _Cold_ Damage, gain _Frigid_, or would take Damage or gain Status from _Ice_ _Terrain_/_Obstacle_, an Ice _Weapon_, or a _Tundra_ ability.
effect: Gain 1 _Instant Guard_ and 1 _Temporary_ _Stamina_. Gain _Warded_ 1 (_Frigid_) and _Resistance_ 1 (_Cold_) this _Turn_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Gain an additional 1 _Instant Guard_ and _Temporary_ _Stamina_, and increase the _Warded_ and _Resistance_ by 1. You may use this _Boost_ up to twice.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Cost is instead None. In addition to the normal effect, add [_Glancing_] to the triggering effect.

name: Frozen Air
desc: You draw the cold from frozen terrain outward, creating a frigid fog.
effect: Create up to 6 contiguous spaces of _Frigid Air_. As a part of this _Action_, you may _Destroy_ any _Frozen_ spaces adjacent to a space you placed _Frigid Air_ in to place an additional space, to a maximum of 12 total spaces of _Frigid Air_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: You may place an additional space of _Frigid Air_. Spaces added in this way ignore the limit, but must be contiguous with other spaces placed this _Turn_.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance, and Cost is instead None. Create _Frigid Air_ in a _Blast_ 1 within Range. You may choose to _Summon_ your _Spirit_ into the centermost space.

name: Frozen Barricade
desc: You freeze the air into thick sheets of ice.
effect: _Draw_ 4. Create an _Ice Wall_ in two contiguous, adjacent, and unoccupied spaces.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, _Draw_ 6 and create _Ice Pillar_s.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The Cost is instead None and Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance. Instead, resolve the Effect from a space within Range. You may choose to _Summon_ your spirit to the Target space.

name: Frozen Shell
desc: You create a casing of ice around a foe, leaving them vulnerable to a powerful strike when it shatters.
effect: Choose a creature with no _Vigor_ within Range. Inflict _Frigid_ 1 on them, then grant them 5 _Vigor_. While the creature has this _Vigor_ they may not gain _Vigor_ from other means, all Attacks against them gain [_Pierce_ 1] and they may not clear _Frigid_ by any means. Upon losing this _Vigor_, they immediately clear all _Frigid_, taking _Cold_ Damage equal to twice the amount lost. A creature may expend _Stamina_ while _Recovering_ to remove 2 of this _Vigor_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Increase the _Vigor_ granted by 2. For every 4 additional _Vigor_ granted in this way, inflict an additional _Frigid_. You may use this _Boost_ any number of times.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_] and remove [_Enchant_]. The Cost is instead None and Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance. Resolve the effect as normal but, when the creature loses this _Vigor_, additionally resolve a _Minor Attack_ from your _Spirit_ as if they were adjacent to the Target. You may not use a [_Manifest_] Ability until this effect ends.

name: Frozen Runway
desc: You ensure a creature cannot find footing on ice, causing them to slip and slide.
trigger: A creature enters a _Frozen_ space within Range.
effect: Immediately inflict _Slide_ 3 on the Target. This _Slide_ must be in the direction of their current Movement, and immediately ends if they are _Slid_ into a non-_Frozen_ space.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Add _Prone_ [1 _Stamina_] or increase the _Slide_ by 2.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance, Cost is instead None, and you may freely apply the _Boost_. Resolve the Effect but, instead of ending the _Slide_ if they move into a non-_Frozen_ space, instead _Draw_ 1 within Range and make the space they were moved into _Frozen_. Only resolve this alternate effect if the space they would move into is within Range.

name: Funnel Cloud
desc: You create a small vortex of wind that can shield or disorient.
effect: Create a _Twister_ in an adjacent space, then draw up to a _Line_ 6 _Hazard_ from it. At the end of each _Phase_ move the _Twister_ along this line, removing _Hazard_ spaces as it passes over them.
boost: 3 _Momentum_: Instead, create 3 adjacent _Twisters_. Resolve the effect as normal, but all _Hazards_ must be created in such a way that all _Twister_s remain adjacent as they move. You may forgo creating a _Hazard_; if you do, this _Boost_ costs only 2 _Momentum_.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance, and Cost is instead None. Resolve the effect from that space and optionally _Summon_ your _Spirit_ into the same space as a created _Twister_. Your _Spirit_ may move with the _Twister_ if you wish.

name: Galeguard
desc: You use your mastery of wind and gale magic to defend yourself.
trigger: You would take Damage or gain Status from _Windy_ _Terrain_, a _Wind_ Material Attack, or a _Gale_ ability.
effect: Gain 1 _Instant Guard_ and 1 _Temporary_ _Stamina_. This _Turn_ you may Negate 2 _Vulnerable_ with 1 _Stamina_ and may gain _Warded_ 1 (_Forced Movement_).
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Gain an additional 1 _Instant Guard_ and _Temporary_ _Stamina_, and increase the _Warded_ by 1. You may use this _Boost_ up to twice.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Cost is instead None. In addition to the normal effect, add [_Glancing_] to the triggering effect.

name: Heat Wave
desc: You purge heat from you in a violent wave.
reqs: May only be used with a _Charged_ Attack_.
effect: Remove _Alight_ X from yourself. Inflict an additional X _Alight_ with the Attack, distributed evenly between the Targets of the Attack.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Instead, remove _Alight_ 2X and inflict an additional 2X _Alight_. Additionally, deal X _Fire_ Damage in a _Burst_ 2, centered either on yourself or a space within your spirit's _Reposition_ Distance. You may _Summon_ your spirit to this space.

name: Internal Furnace
desc: You sacrifice speed for cultivated, white-hot flames.
effect: Gain _Alight_ 2 that you may not _Negate_. When you resolve the Attack, deal an additional +2 _Fire_ _Bonus Damage_ and add _Alight_ 1.
boost: 0 _Momentum_: Instead, gain _Alight_ 4 that you may not _Negate_. When you resolve Attack, deal an additional +4 _Fire_ _Bonus Damage_ and add _Alight_ 2, _Burned_ 1.

name: Ion Charge
desc: You expand an electric field around you, encasing your next strike in electricity.
trigger: A _Phase_ begins.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Cost is instead None. _Summon_ your spirit to an unoccupied space adjacent to a _Minor Source_ within their _Reposition_ distance. They immediately use the Effect and gain all benefits. Upon removing _Charging_ naturally, your Spirit may immediately use a _Storm_ _Minor Attack_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_ (when using the _Manifest_ option): Instead, your Spirit may make a _Storm_ _Major Attack_.

name: Guiding Hand
desc: You gently push an ally out of harm's way, guiding them to a safer locale.
effect: Choose an adjacent ally and inflict _Pull_ 2.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: You may instead make a _Minor Attack_ against an ally. Do not deal Damage and only inflict Status of your choice. You must inflict any _Forced Movement_ caused by the Attack.

name: Hide
desc: You conceal yourself, limiting enemies' ability to strike you.
reqs: Must be adjacent to an _Obstacle_ of at least your size or be in a _Veiled_ space.
effect: You become _Stealthy_.

name: Icy Sheet
desc: You freeze the ground in front of you, creating a sheet of slick ice.
effect: _Draw_ up to 4 within Range, then make X contiguous spaces _Frozen_, where X is the number of spaces you _Drew_ from. At least one _Frozen_ space placed in this way must be adjacent to you. As a part of this _Action_, you may _Draw_ 1 from any spaces adjacent to a space you added _Frozen_ to and immediately make that space _Frozen_. You may not place more than 10 _Frozen_ spaces with this _Action_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: _Draw_ an additional 1, and increase the total number of _Frozen_ spaces that may be placed by 1. You may use this _Boost_ any number of times.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Choose a _Minor Source_ within your spirit's _Reposition_ distance for this ability to originate from. Resolve the effect from that space and freely apply the _Boost_ 3 times. You must make the chosen space _Frozen_ as a part of the Effect. You may choose to _Summon_ your spirit to the origin space.

name: Combo
desc: An impromptu strike, often used to set up an incoming blow.
effect: Make a _Minor Attack_.

name: Inspire
desc: You call out to an ally, filling them with the drive to push on.
trigger: A _Phase_ begins.
effect: Choose any ally within Range. Grant them 2 _Health_ and 2 _Temporary_ _Stamina_. They may immediately _Recover_, but may only spend the _Stamina_ granted by this ability.

name: Intercept
desc: You strike an attack aside, stopping it before it reaches an ally.
trigger: An adjacent ally is Attacked, takes Damage, or gain Status.
effect: Your ally gains 1 _Temporary_ _Stamina_ and 1 _Instant Guard_. After resolving this, gain _Reeling_ 1.
boost: [_Reeling_/2_] _Momentum_ (rounded down): Additionally, _Parry_ for your ally, providing them all benefits. Determine whether the Attacker is within _Reach_ based on your location.

name: Use Environment
desc: You engage with the battlefield, whether that be finding a new weapon or removing a trap.
effect: Resolve the Interact Effect of an Obstacle or Effect in an adjacent space, paying the cost listed for the effect.

name: Jagged Earth
desc: You churn the spikes beneath a foe, forcing them to choose how to defend.
trigger: A creature on an _Earthen_ _Jagged_ space is Attacked.
effect: The Target chooses: Either they immediately suffer the end of turn effect of _Jagged_, or their Attacker gains a +1 _Bonus_.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance, and Cost is instead None. Instead, inflict _Reeling_ 1, _Vulnerable_ 2, grant your ally a +1 _Bonus_, and resolve the end of turn effect of _Jagged_.

name: Kill Shot
desc: You take a calculated shot, focusing on efficacy over accuracy.
reqs: Must be a Ranged Attack against a creature with _Studied_.
effect: Make the _Attack_ with _Advantage_. As a part of this Attack you may remove up to 5 _Studied_, dealing +1 Damage to that creature per _Studied_ removed in this way. If the _Attack_ was a _Crit_, instead deal +2 Damage per _Studied_ removed.
special: If you already have _Advantage_, this instead costs only 1 _Momentum_.

name: Landguard
desc: You use your mastery of the land and earthen magic to defend yourself.
trigger: You would take Damage or gain Status from _Earthen_ _Terrain_, an _Earthen Obstacle_, or a _Land_ ability.
effect: Gain 1 _Instant Guard_ and 1 _Temporary_ _Stamina_. Gain _Warded_ 1 (_Prone_) this _Turn_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Gain an additional 1 _Instant Guard_ and _Temporary_ _Stamina_. You may use this _Boost_ up to twice.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Cost is instead None. In addition to the normal effect, add [_Glancing_] to the triggering effect.

name: Linebreaker
desc: You plant your foot and charge, driving through anything that could break your stride.
effect: Immediately take a _Reposition_ Move [_Breach_, _Rush_], interrupting your current Movement. For this Movement you gain 2 _Temporary_ _Stamina_ and _Resistance_ 2 [_All_]. Lose these effects at the end of the Movement rather than the end of the _Turn_. This Movement may interrupt a different Move.
special: Inflict _Vulnerable_ 1 on all creatures you Move through this _Turn_.

name: Luring Step
desc: You taunt your foe forward, drawing them further into your trap.
effect: Choose an adjacent Target _Marked_ by you that is not _Stuck_. The Target must choose; they can either Move with you, adding [_Safe_] but must end their Movement adjacent to you, or immediately gain _Exposed_ 2, _Reeling_ 2.
special: Creatures _Marked_ by you treat this Movement as [_Safe_]. This Movement does not end _Marked_, even if you move away from your _Marked_ target.

name: Impromptu Trap
desc: You hazardously array a nearby weapon, repurposing it into a trap.
effect: Choose an _Opportune_ Weapon you are _Wielding_. Remove it and replace it with a Size 1 _Hazard_. The first time a creature moves into this space remove the _Hazard_ and make an Attack against the creature with the Weapon you removed. This Attack has _Advantage_ and ignores _Speed Penalty_.

name: Leap
desc: You leap forward, hurdling over hazards and other dangers.
effect: The next X spaces you Move, where X is up to your Jump Value, is [_Leaping_] Movement. This Movement must be taken in a straight line, and this Movement may not be broken up in any way.

name: Lifting Gale
desc: You create a swirling vortex of air to launch an ally or cushion a fall.
effect: Place an _Updraft_ within range.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Place an additional _Updraft_ adjacent to another _Updraft_ placed this _Turn_. You may use this _Boost_ up to 2 times.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The _Cost_ is now none and Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance. Instead, create _Updraft_ spaces in a _Blast_ 1 within Range. You may choose to _Summon_ your Spirit to the centermost space of the _Blast_.

name: Localized Tremor
desc: You set your stance, causing the earth around you to quake violently.
effect: Until you leave your current space, _Earthen_ spaces in the _Area_ are considered _Uneven Earth_. Additionally, any creature that end their _Turn_ in one of these spaces or enters one of these spaces gains _Vulnerable_ 1 if they are impacted by the _Uneven Earth_ (maximum once per _Turn_).
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, _Area_ is _Burst_ 2.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The _Cost_ is now none and Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance. Choose an unoccupied _Earthen_ space within _Range_. _Summon_ your spirit to that space, then resolve the _Effect_, treating your spirit as the user. While _Summoned_ in this way your spirit may not willingly move, and if they leave the space the effect ends.

name: Lock Down
desc: A prepared shot that is taken at the opportune moment.
trigger: You successfully _Grab_ with an _Attack_.
effect: Add _Impaired_ 2 and gain a +1 _Bonus_ to the next opposed _Grab_ roll this _Round_.

name: Marching Tune
desc: You urge an ally forward, allowing them to more swiftly respond.
effect: Choose any ally within Range. Grant them _Joyful_ 1, _Accelerated_, and they may immediately take a _Free Turn_ to _Step_.

name: Mark Prey
desc: You focus your attention on a single creature, ignoring all other potential targets.
effect: Choose a creature within Range and inflict _Studied_ 2 on them. Until that creature is _Defeated_ or you use this _Action_ again deal +2 _Damage_ to that creature and add [_Pierce_ 1] if they have _Studied_, but you have _Disadvantage_ on all Attacks against other creatures.

name: Mark Target
desc: You focus your attention on a single target, setting them up for a deadly blow.
effect: Choose a foe within Range. Inflict _Studied_ 2, _Reeling_ 1. If you do not see them as _Obscured_ from your current position, inflict an additional _Studied_ 1. After resolving this effect, you may convert any amount of _Studied_ on the target into _Exposed_.

name: Mark the Path
desc: You trailblaze forward, finding a safe path for allies as you do so.
effect: Place a _Blessing_ in every space you move through. While the _Blessing_ persists, you and allies may ignore the _Terrain_ in that space when moving through it. Remove the _Blessing_ if the _Terrain_ in the space changes. _Blessings_ placed by this effect persist until the end of the next _Phase_.

name: Mark
desc: You get in close with a foe, forcing their attention towards you.
effect: Add _Marked_, _Impaired_ _0/0/0/1_.

name: Missing Scale
desc: You call out a hole in an opponent's defenses, allowing an ally to strike true.
trigger: You or an ally attacks a foe with _Studied_.
effect: Before resolving the Attack remove up to 3 _Studied_ from the Target. Add _Dazed_ _0/0/1/2_ and [_Pierce_ X] to the Attack, where X is the _Studied_ removed.

name: Outmanuever
desc: You use your speed to force an opening against a foe.
reqs: All Targets have not used their _Technique_ yet this _Round_ and the Attack is _Light_/_Versatile_.
effect:
You may remove an additional _Vulnerable_ and choose one:
* The _Speed_ of this Attack is decreased by 1, or 2 if it's _Light_.
* You gain a +1 _Bonus_.

name: Opportunity Attack
desc: You capitalize on the opening created by a repositioning foe, moving to strike while you can.
trigger: An enemy within your _Reach_ creates an _Opening_.
effect: Make a Single-Target _Melee_ _Minor Attack_ against the triggering creature. You must use a _Minor Attack_ with a _Reach_ capable of attacking the Target.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, use a Single-Target _Melee_ _Major Attack_.

name: Overcharge
desc: You conduct lightning throughout your body, preparing to unleash it in a torrent.
trigger: A _Phase_ begins.
effect:
Become _Charging_ until the end of the _Phase_. While _Charging_, gain _Resistance_ 1 (_Lightning_) and _Warded_ 1 (_Shocked_). In the _Phase_ after removing _Charging_, gain the following benefits:
* All _Lightning_ Damage you do gains _Pierce_ 1.
* All _Storm_ _Attacks_ treat their _Speed_ as 1 lower.
* Gain 2 _Momentum_ that may only be spent as a part of _Storm_ _Attacks_/_Boosts_  and is lost at the end of the _Phase_.

You only gain this benefit if you lose _Charging_ at the end of _Phase_, not if you lose it due to _Break_ or other similar effects.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Cost is instead None. _Summon_ your spirit to an unoccupied space adjacent to a _Minor Source_ within their _Reposition_ distance. They immediately use the Effect and gain all benefits. Upon removing _Charging_ naturally, your Spirit may immediately use a _Storm_ _Minor Attack_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_ (when using the _Manifest_ option): Instead, your Spirit may make a _Storm_ _Major Attack_.

name: Overrun
desc: You run bodily through an obstruction, powering through them without breaking stride.
effect:
Choose one:
* Make a _Minor Attack_ with the [_Body_] keyword against a creature you are in the same space as. If the Attack would inflict _Push_, you may instead inflict _Angled_ _Push_. Add _Vulnerable_ _0/0/1/2_ and on a _Hit_+ that creature takes a -1 _Penalty_ on Attacks against you this _Turn_.
* Make a _Minor Attack_ with the [_Body_] keyword against an adjacent _Obstacle_. Add [_Siege_]. If you _Destroy_ it, immediately move into that space without expending any Movement.
special: You may only trigger this _Reaction_ against a given creature once per _Turn_.

name: Pack Punishment
desc: You punish a foe as they attempt to defend themselves.
trigger: A foe within Range 3 uses a _Defensive_ _Reaction_.
effect: Make a _Minor Attack_ against the Target, resolving it prior to the triggering effect. Add _Vulnerable_ _1/1/2/3_.

name: Plate Lock
desc: You solidify the plates of your armor, sacrificing mobility to become unstoppable.
trigger: You are Attacked, take Damage or gain Status.
effect: Gain 2 _Instant Guard_ and 1 _Temporary_ _Stamina_, then gain _Reeling_ 1. You may not use an _Action_ or _Technique_ this _Phase_.
special: Cost is ([_Reeling_/2]) _Momentum_ if you have Stone Armor.

name: Relentless Assault
desc: After unleashing a mighty blow you charge forth for never-ending combat.
reqs: Must be an Attack made due to a _Charged_ effect.
effect: Immediately _Step_, then make a _Minor Attack_. You must target a creature hit by the _Charged_ effect.

name: Focus
desc: You focus in, building momentum for your next action.
effect: Gain 2 _Momentum_.

name: Prideful Boast
desc: You let out a challenge, drawing the attention of nearby foes.
effect: Inflict _Marked_, _Enraged_ 1 on foes in the _Area_, then gain 2 _Health_.

name: Prideful Clash
desc: When a nearby foe insults your pride by attacking another you can't help but retaliate.
trigger: A foe within Range attacks an ally.
effect: Make a Single-Target _Minor Attack_ against the triggering creature. On a _Graze_+, grant the triggering ally _Courageous_ 1.
special: You have _Advantage_ on this _Attack_ if you have _Marked_ the Target or you are the target of their rage.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, make a _Major Attack_.

name: Provoke
desc: You draw the ire of a nearby foe with insults or guile, forcing them to focus on you.
effect: Inflict _Vulnerable_ 1, _Exposed_/_Enraged_ 1 on a creature within Range.
special: Each successive use against the same creature in the same _Turn_ costs 1 more _Momentum_.

name: Raise Guard
desc: You adopt a defensive stance, warding yourself against harm.
effect: You become _Guarding_ and mark the _Area_. Gain 1 _Guard_ against all effects that originate from or pass through one of those spaces. This _Area_ moves with you and, at the end of each of your _Turns_ you may rotate this _Area_.
special: As a part of this _Action_ you may also choose an un-_Sundered_, _Wielded_ piece of _Equipment_. It becomes _Occupied_ so long as you are _Guarding_, but you automatically use that _Equipment_ to _Parry_ all effects that pass through or originate in the _Area_. End _Guarding_ if you are _Disarmed_ of the _Equipment_ used for this _Action_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: You may choose a piece of _Sundered_ _Equipment_.

name: Rally
desc: You take a moment to collect yourself and restore your ability to fight.
effect:
_Refresh_ and choose one:
* You or an adjacent ally _Recovers_.
* You may attempt to escape a _Grab_ without paying the initial _Momentum_ cost.
* Reduce _Reeling_ by 1 on yourself, your spirit, or an adjacent ally.
* Remove _Prone_ from an adjacent ally.

You may resolve these effects in any order, including interrupting a _Recover_ with a _Refresh_ or similar.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_: Add the below options to the choices above:
  * Move is instead _Step_.
* 1 _Momentum_: Gain 1 _Temporary_ _Stamina_. You may use this _Boost_ any number of times.

name: Rending Assault
desc: You make an attack more focused on disrupting a foe's defenses than physically harming them.
effect: Choose a single Target of this Attack. This _Attack_ deals half Damage. Until the end of the _Round_, allies may remove an additional _Vulnerable_ when attacking this creature.
special:
* If this is a _Minor Attack_, add _Vulnerable_ _0/1/2/3_, _Reeling_ _0/0/1/1_.
* If this is a _Major Attack_, add _Vulnerable_ _1/2/3/5_, _Reeling_ _0/1/2/3_.

name: Resonant Quake
desc: You cause your quake to resonate with nearby obstacles, potentially shattering them.
effect: Deal additional Damage to all _Obstacles_ hit by this Attack equal to 2 + the current _Phase_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Deal +2 Damage. You may use this _Boost_ any number of times.

name: Reverse Erosion
desc: You gather stone from around you, forging layer of stone over your form.
effect: Choose a Size 1 _Earthen_ Obstacle within _Range_ 2. _Destroy_ it, gain 5 _Vigor_, 1 _Stamina_, and 1 _Momentum_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Restore 1 _Guard_ to your Stone Armor.

name: Rock Lock
desc: You become a behemoth of stone, obstructing and controlling the battlefield.
effect:
Gain _Slowed_ and _Tough_, then _Destroy_ an adjacent _Size_ 1 _Earthen_ Obstacle and become _Guarding_. While _Guarding_:
* You may not _Move_.
* Gain _Resistance_ 1 [All but _Crush_].
* Increase your _Size_ by 1, inflicting _Push_ 1 that may not be Negated on creatures as needed to occupy new spaces. There must be sufficient unoccupied spaces to use this effect.
* You are treated as an _Obstacle_ when determining _Cover_/_Obscured_ with a _Height_ equal to your Size. If you have _Stone Armor_, instead gain 3 _Vigor_.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance, and Cost is instead None. _Summon_ your Spirit in or adjacent to an _Earth_ _Source_. Grant them 5 _Vigor_, then resolve the remaining Effect on them. Instead make them as Size 1 or 1 Size larger, whichever is greater.

name: Impact
desc: You use your momentum to accelerate into an attack, driving as much force into it as possible.
reqs: Must be a _Melee_ Attack and you must have moved at least 2 spaces with [_Breach_/_Rush_] Movement this _Turn_ prior to this Attack.
effect: Reduce your remaining Movement by up to X (maximum 3). Add _Push_/_Bonus Damage_ X to the Attack.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Add _Dazed_ X (maximum 2).

name: Safe Harbor
desc: You calm the spirits of nearby water, creating a safe realm for your allies.
effect: Until the end of the _Round_ you and your allies may choose to ignore the effects of _Water_ _Terrain_ in the _Area_ (but must still _Swim_ if applicable) and may move through _Water Veil_ spaces without expending additional Movement. Additionally, _Water_ _Terrain_ within the _Area_ is considered _Fortified_ _Terrain_ for you and your allies. This _Area_ moves with you.
special: When you use this _Action_ you may _Draw_ 2 within Range 4, then immediately create X _Wet_ spaces within Range, where X is the number of spaces _Drawn_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, _Area_ is _Burst_ 2. Instead, _Draw_ 3.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The Cost is instead None and Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance. Choose an unoccupied _Water_ space within Range. _Summon_ your spirit to that space, then resolve the Effect, treating your spirit as the user and applying the Boost at no cost.

name: Scathing Words
desc: You unleash a string of insults, disrupting and disorienting a foe.
effect: Choose a foe within Range. Inflict _Anguished_/_Enraged_ 1, _Reeling_ 1. If one of their allies was defeated this _Phase_, instead inflict _Anguished_/_Enraged_ 2, _Reeling_ 1.

name: Scouting
desc: You cast a watchful eye towards a foe, finding holes in their defenses.
effect: Choose a creature within Range. Inflict _Studied_ 1 on them, or _Studied_ 2 if you do not see them as _Obscured_ from your current position.

name: Serpent's Lunge
desc: You wind up before an attack, granting you additional reach with it.
effect: Instead of immediately resolving the attack, become _Charging_. Resolve this Attack at the end of the current _Phase_. Increase the _Reach_ by 1, and add _Reeling_ 1 on a _Graze_+. Treat this Attack as if it was _Charged_ for all other effects.

name: Set Feet
desc: You steady yourself as you continue to charge a heavy strike.
trigger: A _Phase_ ends while you are _Charging_.
effect: You gain 1 _Guard_ until the end of the next _Phase_. Additionally, you may gain 1 _Stamina_ or _Health_ 2. Finally, if you would normally be required to remove _Charging_ and resolve the effect, you may choose to remain _Charging_ until the end of the next _Phase_.

name: Shepard's Opening
desc: You distract a foe with  your strike, providing an ally the opportunity to slip away.
effect: Choose an ally adjacent to an enemy targeted by this Attack. Grant them a _Free Turn_ where they may _Step_ [_Safe_].
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Choose an additional ally adjacent to an enemy targeted by this Attack and grant them a _Free Turn_ where they may _Step_ [_Safe_]. You may use this effect as many times as you wish, but may only target a given ally once.

name: Sheparding Blow
desc: You make a strike with the intent of repositioning a foe, creating space for allies.
effect: If the effect already has _Forced Movement_, increase it by 1 and add _Angled_, or increase it by 2 if it is already _Angled_. If this effect does not have _Forced Movement_, add _Angled_ _Push_ 1. You may instead add _Angled_ _Pull_ 1 if it is a Melee Attack.

name: Shielding Wave
desc: You pull forth water, creating a temporary shield against an attack.
trigger: You or any ally within _Range_ are Attacked, take Damage, or gain Status.
effect: _Draw_ 1 within _Range_. If you cannot, this _Manuever_ fails. Grant the target of the Attack 1 _Temporary_ _Stamina_, 1 _Instant Guard_, and reduce the _Attack Roll_ by 1. Additionally, they gain _Resistance_ 2 [_Fire_] until the end of the _Turn_. After resolving this, create a _Wet_ space adjacent to the Target and gain _Reeling_ 1.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead of a _Wet_ space, create a _Water Veil_ in a space adjacent to the Target after resolving the Effect.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance, and Cost is instead 1 + your Spirit's [_Reeling_] _Momentum_. Resolve the above effects and add [_Glancing_]. Resolve the Attack against your Spirit as well. Your Spirit gains _Reeling_ rather than you when used in this way.

name: Shift
desc: You swiftly move, adjusting your footing before taking a more serious action.

name: Shifting Stone
desc: You propel a heavy stone forward, potentially crushing a foe.
effect: _Slide_ 4 [_Earthbend_] the _Obstacle_.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_: Increase the _Slide_ by 2. You may use this option up to 3 times.
* 1 _Momentum_: Add [_Forceful_].
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The _Cost_ is now none and Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance. You may choose to have your _Spirit_ remain _Summoned_ adjacent to the _Obstacle_ in a space of your choice. You may use 2 _Momentum_ of _Boost_ for no Cost.

name: Fight
desc: You make a sudden attack, seamlessly integrating it with your maneuvering.
effect: Make a _Minor Attack_.
boost:
Choose one:
* 1 _Momentum_: Move is instead _Step_.
* 2 _Momentum_: Make an additional _Minor Attack_.
* 2 _Momentum_: Instead, make a _Major Attack_.

name: Slip
desc: You move with practiced ease, sliding across the battlefield.
effect: Inflict _Exposed_ 1 on a creature you move adjacent to this _Turn_. At the end of this Movement if all enemies see you as _Obscured_, gain _Stealthy_.
special: Do not remove _Stealthy_ until the end of this _Turn_ if it would normally be removed.

name: Sling Stone
desc: You seize a nearby piece of terrain, flinging it with powerful force.
effect: _Forceful_ _Push_ 6 [_Earthbend_] the Obstacle.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_: Range is instead 4.
* 1 _Momentum_: If a _Collision_ occurs and this has [_Manifest_], make an Attack with one of your spirit's _Weapons_ against the Target, originating it from the _Obstacle's_ space, adding [_Avoidable_], and resolving it before the _Collision_. Any effects that trigger based on moving a number of spaces instead use how far the _Obstacle_ has moved.
* 2 _Momentum_: If a _Collision_ occurs and this lacks [_Manifest_], additionally make an Attack with a _Large Improvised_ Weapon against the Target, originating it from the _Obstacle's_ space, adding [_Avoidable_], and resolving it before the _Collision_.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance, and Cost is instead None.

name: Sniper's Perch
desc: You find yourself an ideal position, allowing you to better find your targets.
reqs: Must be adjacent to an _Obstacle_ of at least Size 1 or be in a _Fortified_/_Obscured_ space.
effect: Gain _Hobbled_ 1 and 1 _Momentum_. Gain an additional _Momentum_ if you have not moved since you last used this _Action_. Until you leave your current space, increase the range of your _Ranged_ Attacks by 2. Additionally, you may treat this space as _Fortified_ or, if it is already _Fortified_, it is always at least _Lightly Obscured_.

name: Spectacular Finish
desc: You end a duel in a spectacular fashion, destroying a foe's defenses as you drive them away.
reqs: Attack must only target a creature _Marked_ by you, you and the target must have no other adjacent creatures.
effect: Make this _Attack_ at _Advantage_. Deal +1 Damage and add _Push_ 1, _Break_ [1 _Stamina_], _Exposed_ 1, _Reeling_ 1. Remove _Marked_ from the Target and, if you are _Marked_ by them, also remove that effect. You may not _Mark_ that creature again this _Round_.
special: For each full _Round_ you have had the creature _Marked_, increase the Cost by 1, but also increase all Damage and Status inflicted as well as the cost to Negate by 2. For example, if this creature was _Marked_ for 1 full _Round_, you would instead add 3 Damage, _Push_ 3, _Break_ [3 _Stamina_], _Exposed_ 3, _Reeling_ 3.

name: Spikes
desc: You form jagged lines of earth, making the way forward impassable.
effect:
Gain 4 Spike Points, which may be spent for various effects this Turn:
* 1 Point: Make an _Earthen_ spaces within Range _Jagged_. You may select this option any number of times but all _Jagged_ spaces placed in this way must be contiguous.
* 2 Points: Choose a _Jagged_ space within range. Replace it with an _Earth Spire_. You may not select a _Jagged_ space created this _Turn_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Gain an additional 2 Spike Points. You may select this Boost any number of times.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance, and Cost is instead None. Instead, pick a point within _Range_ and, in a _Burst_ 1, make all _Jagged_ spaces _Earth Spire_s and all _Earthen_ spaces _Jagged_.

name: Spirit Summon
desc: Your spirit takes physical form, fighting alongside you.
trigger: _Respite_ begins.
effect: Choose a _Major Source_ within Range. _Summon_ your spirit until the end of the _Round_ to a space adjacent to the _Major Source_. They may use a single _Technique_ and have 1 _AP_ this _Round_. They may use any Basic _Techniques_ or _Maneuvers_, or any _Techniques_ or _Maneuvers_ with the _Spirit_ keyword known by you.
special: If your _Spirit_ was _Summoned_ at the end of the last _Round_, you may instead have it remain in its current space, regardless of _Sources_.

name: Spiritual Interdiction
desc: Your spirit leaps to defend you, taking the brunt of a blow.
cost: [_Reeling_] _Momentum_ (use your spirit's value, not your own)
trigger: You are Attacked, take Damage, or gain Status while adjacent to a _Major Source_.
effect: You may use up to 1 _Stamina_ from your spirit. After determining total Damage but before applying your _Guard_, split the Damage in half. Your spirit takes half, and you take the other half. After resolving this, you and your spirit gain _Reeling_ 1.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, you may use this while adjacent to a _Minor Source_.

name: Spitting Cinders
desc: You cause a roaring fire spit out further flames, spreading it far and wide.
effect: Create two _Blazing_ spaces within Range 3 of the Target.
special: _Flammable_ spaces that become _Blazing_ due to this ability may place another _Blazing_ space within Range 3 rather than adjacent.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Repeat the Effect. You may use this _Boost_ up to 3 times.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The Cost is instead None and Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance. Remove the Target space when used in this way, but repeat the Effect 3 times. You may choose to _Summon_ your spirit to the Target space.

name: Sprint
desc: You charge forward, limiting your mobility for sheer speed.
reqs: About to make a Move without [_Rush_].
effect: Increase the tier of your current Movement (making a _Step_ a _Reposition_, for example), but add [_Rush_]. If the Movement is already _Dash_, instead add [_Rush_, _Breach_].
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Add [_Breach_].

name: Step In
desc: You violently advance as you prepare an assault, lashing out at a foe to keep them near.
trigger: You become _Charging_.
effect: Before you become _Charging_, make a _Minor Attack_. On a _Hit_+, add your choice of _Hobbled_ 1/_Pull_ 2.

name: Stinging Approach
desc: You quickly close the gap, making a strike before foes can retaliate.
effect: After completing your _Move_, make a _Minor Attack_.

name: Stoke Flames
desc: You encourage nearby flames, causing them to rise up into a blazing inferno.
effect: Choose 4 contiguous _Blazing_ spaces within Range and make them _Roaring_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Effect an additional 2 _Blazing_ spaces. You may use this _Boost_ up to 2 times.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The Cost is instead None and Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance. You may either create 4 _Roaring_ spaces without the requisite _Blazing_ spaces or use the _Boost_ twice at no cost.

name: Stoneguard
desc: You use your mastery of stone and earthen magic to defend yourself.
trigger: You would take Damage or gain Status from an _Earthen_ _Obstacle_, _Stone_ Material Attack, or _Mountain_ ability.
effect: Gain 1 _Guard_ and 1 _Temporary_ _Stamina_ against the triggering effect.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Gain an additional 1 _Guard_ and _Temporary_ _Stamina_. You may use this _Boost_ up to twice.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Cost is instead None. In addition to the normal effect, add [_Glancing_] to the triggering effect.

name: Strength of the Pride
desc: You inspire an ally, rallying their defenses while drawing the ire of their attacker.
trigger: An ally within Range takes Damage or gains a Status.
effect: Your ally treats their _Reeling_ as half its current value this _Turn_. If they use a _Defensive_ _Reaction_ against the triggering effect they gain _Courageous_ 1, and you may inflict _Marked_ on their attacker.

name: Surging Flourish
desc: You build up a powerful surge of water as you attack, unleashing it in a powerful blast.
effect: Immediately _Draw_ 1 within Range. Inflict _Soaked_ 1, _Push_ 2, _Reeling_ 1 on the original Target.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Increase the _Push_ by 2. You may use this _Boost_ twice.

name: Stormguard
desc: You use your mastery of the lightning magic to defend yourself.
trigger: You take _Lightning _ Damage, gain _Shocked_, or would take Damage or gain Status from _Electric_ _Terrain_/_Obstacle_, an Electric _Weapon_, or a _Storm_ ability.
effect: Gain 1 _Guard_ and 1 _Temporary_ _Stamina_ against the triggering effect. Gain _Warded_ 1 (_Shocked_) and _Resistance_ 1 (_Lightning_) this _Turn_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Gain an additional 1 _Guard_ and _Temporary_ _Stamina_, and increase the _Warded_ and _Resistance_ by 1. You may use this _Boost_ up to twice.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Cost is instead None. In addition to the normal effect, add [_Glancing_] to the triggering effect.

name: Sudden Updraft
desc: You imbue an updraft with power, creating a dangerous trap or powerful boon.
effect:
Choose an _Updraft_ within Range. The first time a creature enters that space or ends their _Turn_ there remove the _Hazard_ and resolve one of the following effects:
* The creature may use the _Leap_ Manuever immediately at no _Cost_ and without expending any _Movement_.
* The creature gains _Exposed_ 2, _Airborne_ [2 _Stamina_]. If they were suffering _Forced Movement_, continue that effect.

After resolving either effect, remove the _Updraft_.

name: Swift Search
desc: You quickly scan the battlefield, finding an opportunity as quickly as possible.
effect: Place a _Weapon_ within Range. You may not place it adjacent to yourself or an ally. This _Weapon_ is a _Small Improvised_ Weapon, is made of the same Material as the Terrain or an adjacent Obstacle (you choose), and has [_Fragile_, _Opportune_]. Only you and your allies may use this Weapon.

name: Synchronized Assault
desc: You expertly time an attack with an ally, connecting in rapid succession.
effect: Choose an ally within Range. Your ally may take a _Free Turn_ where they make a _Minor Attack_ against the same creature as you. Resolve these _Attacks_ in either order. After resolving both _Attacks_ inflict _Vulnerable_ X, where X is equal to 4 - the difference between your _Attack Rolls_ (minimum 1).
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, choose any ally, ignoring range.

name: Tailwind
desc: You place the wind at an ally's back, sending them surging forward.
effect: Gain 1 _Momentum_. Choose an ally within Range. Grant them _Accelerated_. While your ally is _Accelerated_ by this effect increase their _Movement_ by 1 and grant them [_Windwalk_].
special: If the ally is in a _Windy_ space you may inflict _Slide_ 1 on them. This _Slide_ must be in the same direction as the _Windy_ space if it has a direction.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance, and Cost is instead None. Make your ally's space _Windy_ before resolving the Effect, and instead _Slide_ 3 them.

name: Thunderous Tempo
desc: Call down a rolling storm of lightning, striking one space after another.
effect: Create a _Hazard_ in the _Area_. At the end of each _Phase_, starting with the space closest to you when the _Hazard_ was created, deal 2 _Lightning_ Damage and inflict _Shocked_ 1, then remove that _Hazard_ space. If this hit a creature, remove all other _Hazards_ and end the effect. Otherwise, continue the effect, dealing an additional 2 _Lightning_ Damage for each successive _Phase_, and adding an additional 1 _Shocked_ for every other successive _Phase_ (i.e., when removing a _Hazard_ for the 3rd time with this effect, deal 6 _Lightning_ Damage and inflict _Shocked_ 2.).
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, _Area_ is _Line_ 6.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The Cost is instead None, and Range is instead your spirit's Reposition distance. Create the _Hazard_ from any space within _Range_. You may choose to _Summon_ your spirit to the origin space.

name: Tidal Current
desc: You push and pull the water near you, spreading it across the field.
effect: Gain 1 _Momentum_, then _Draw_ 4 within _Range_. After, place _Wet_ spaces adjacent to the spaces you _Drew_ from, as if you inflicted _Push_/_Pull_ 1 on the original space. You must apply your choice of _Push_/_Pull_ for all spaces. If you _Drew_ multiple times from the same _Source_ place _Wet_ spaces in a _Line_ equal to the number of times you _Drew_ from it.
special: This counts as a _Tide_ ability that inflicts _Push_/_Pull_.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_: _Draw_ 2 more. You may use this _Boost_ any number of times.
* 1 _Momentum_: Increase the _Push_/_Pull_ by 1. You may use this Boost up to 3 times.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance, and Cost is instead None. Choose a space within Range that is/is adjacent to a _Minor Source_. Resolve the Effect from that space and freely apply 1 _Momentum_ worth of _Boost_.

name: To Me!
desc: You call an ally toward you, providing them a safe path forward.
effect: Choose an ally that is within their _Step_ distance from you. Grant them a _Free Turn_ where they may _Step_ towards you by the shortest possible distance. You and your ally then both gain _Courageous_ 1 and they gain 2 _Stamina_.

name: Tumble
desc: You roll forward, moving swiftly and avoiding incoming strikes.
effect: The next X spaces you Move, where X is up to your _Step_ distance gain [_Safe_, _Breach_, _Rush_]. This Movement may not be broken up in any way.

name: Victory Cry
desc: You let out a triumphant yell, spurring your allies onward.
trigger: Any ally defeats a foe.
effect: Allies in the _Area_ gain _Courageous_ 1 and may immediately Move 1. The next attack by these allies may remove an additional 2 _Vulnerable_.

name: Waiting Stone
desc: You pull a stone loose, preparing it to fire a moment's notice.
effect: Create a _Burst_ 3 _Hazard_ around the _Obstacle_. If an enemy enters a space within this Area, _Forceful_ _Slide_ 6 [_Earthbend_] the _Obstacle_ into them by the shortest possible route. If the Obstacle moves, move the _Hazard_ with it.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Remove _Enchant_.
special: If the _Obstacle_ is a _Boulder_, reduce the cost by 1.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_] and remove [_Enchant_]. The Cost is instead None and Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance. Resolve the effect as normal but, after resolving the _Slide_, _Destroy_ the _Obstacle_ and additionally resolve a _Minor Attack_ from your _Spirit_ as if they were adjacent to the Target. You may not use a [_Manifest_] Ability until this effect ends.

name: Wall of Earth
desc: You shape the ground upwards, forming an earthen barricade.
effect: Create an _Earth Block_ in two contiguous, adjacent, and unoccupied _Earthen_ spaces.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, create _Earth Pillar_s.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The Cost is instead None and Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance. Instead, resolve the Effect from an _Earthen_ space within Range and create an additional _Earth Block_. You may choose to _Summon_ your spirit to the Target space.

name: Warcry
desc: You let out an inspiring cry, filling your allies with the soul of battle.
effect: Choose an ally within Range and grant them 2 _Health_, _Enraged_ 1. You may choose the target of the creature's rage, but they must be within Range 3 of you.
special: If you _Defeated_ an enemy this _Turn_, instead grant 3 _Health_, _Enraged_ 2.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Grant your ally a _Free Turn_ where they may _Step_ towards the target of their rage.

name: Warding Step
desc: You step forward, pulling an ally from danger as you do so.
effect: Once during this _Turn_ you may swap spaces with an ally. When you do so, they gain 3 _Health_ and may then immediately _Refresh_ or _Recover_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Your ally may _Refresh_ and _Recover_ .

name: Waterdraw
desc: You spread water across the battlefield, making the land slick and wet.
effect: _Draw_ 2 within Range, then create 2 contiguous _Wet_ spaces within Range.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: _Draw_ an additional 2 and place an additional 2 _Wet_ spaces. You may use this _Boost_ any number of times.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The Cost is instead None. Choose a space within your spirit's _Reposition_ distance and resolve all effects from that space. _Draw_ 7 within Range, then place _Wet_ spaces in a _Blast_ 1 centered on the Target space. You may not _Boost_ when using this option. You may choose to _Summon_ your spirit to the centermost space of this Area.

name: Waveguard
desc: You use your mastery of water and aquatic magic to defend yourself.
trigger: You would take Damage or gain Status from _Water_ _Terrain_, a _Water_ Material Attack, or a _Tide_ ability.
effect: Gain 1 _Instant Guard_ and 1 _Temporary_ _Stamina_. This _Turn_ you may Negate _Soaked_ with 1 _Stamina_ and may gain _Warded_ 1 (_Soaked_).
special: For every _Soaked_ you _Negate_ place a _Wet_ space adjacent to you.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Gain an additional 1 _Instant Guard_ and _Temporary_ _Stamina_, and increase the _Warded_ by 1. You may use this _Boost_ up to twice.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Cost is instead None. In addition to the normal effect, add [_Glancing_] to the triggering effect.

name: White Hot
desc: The heat roiling off you as you cultivate a flame drives foes backwards and sears the air.
trigger: A _Phase_ ends while you are _Charging_ an effect that deals _Fire_ Damage.
effect: Gain _Alight_ 2. You may not _Negate_ this. Deal 2 _Fire_ Damage in a _Burst_ 1.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Do not gain _Alight_, and resolve both Effects.

name: Windshaper
desc: You seize the wind, changing its direction and dictating its flow.
effect: Choose a _Gusting_ space within Range. You may change the direction of it and any contiguous _Gusting_ spaces so long as their directions remain continuous.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: As a part of this _Manuever_, you may move 2 target _Gusting_ spaces 1 space. You may choose the same _Gusting_ space twice, but all spaces must remain contiguous. You may use this _Boost_ up to 3 times.

name: Windstorm
desc: You create a sudden gale, disrupting the battlefield with a mighty gust.
effect: Place 3 _Gusting_ spaces within Range. All _Gusting_ spaces placed in this way must be contiguous, and the direction of all spaces placed in this way must be continuous.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Place an additional 3 _Gusting_ spaces. You may use this _Boost_ up to 3 times, and may choose to place these additional _Gusting_ spaces as a different contiguous group.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The Cost is instead None. Choose a space within your spirit's _Reposition_ distance and resolve all effects from that space, applying the _Boost_ twice.  You may choose to _Summon_ your spirit to any space that becomes _Gusting_.

name: Wind Tight
desc: You focus your attention on nearby enemies, punishing any bad behavior.
effect: Become _Guarding_. While _Guarding_ in this way, gain 1 _Temporary_ _Stamina_ each _Turn_ and ignore the normal _Penalty_ to Attacks. You may only make Attacks as a part of _Punish_ _Reactions_, but gain a +1 _Bonus_ to all such Attacks and reduce their cost by 1. You lose this effect if you _Move_.

name: Overgrow
desc: You cause overgrowth to take over the landscape.
effect: Place 3 _Brush_ spaces within Range. All _Brush_ spaces placed by this Manuever must be contiguous.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Create an additional 2 _Brush_ spaces. You may use this Boost up to 3 times.

name: Contact Poison
desc: You coat your weapon with poison at the moment of impact, singing a foe.
effect: Deal +2 _Poison_ _Bonus Damage_ and add _Poisoned_ 1.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Inflict an additional _Poisoned_ 1.

name: Bramble Seeds
desc: You plant seeds that erupt violently into brambles.
effect: Mark 3 contiguous spaces within Range as a _Hazard_. At the end of the next _Phase_ remove the _Hazard_ and make the spaces _Brambles_. Any creatures in these spaces immediately suffer the _Bramble_ effect and gain _Hobbled_ [1 _Stamina_].
